heading: HR00592
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CIVIL REGISTRY SYSTEM-INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY PROJECT PHASE 2 DEAL BETWEEN THE PHILIPPINE STATISTICS AUTHORITY AND U.S. BASED UNISYS CORPORATION, IN CONNECTION WITH THE GROSS VIOLATIONS AND FAILURES OF UNISYS AS THE SAME PROPONENT OF THE PROJECT'S FIRST PHASE, PARTICULARLY ITS UNBRIDLED CONTROL OF THE COUNTRY'S CIVIL REGISTRY SYSTEM, AND TO ULTIMATELY NEVER ALLOW FOREIGN CONTROL OF THE SAME
status: Pending with the Committee on POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS since 2016-12-13
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00592
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CIVIL REGISTRY SYSTEM-INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY PROJECT PHASE 2 DEAL BETWEEN THE PHILIPPINE STATISTICS AUTHORITY AND U.S. BASED UNISYS CORPORATION, IN CONNECTION WITH THE GROSS VIOLATIONS AND FAILURES OF UNISYS AS THE SAME PROPONENT OF THE PROJECT'S FIRST PHASE, PARTICULARLY ITS UNBRIDLED CONTROL OF THE COUNTRY'S CIVIL REGISTRY SYSTEM, AND TO ULTIMATELY NEVER ALLOW FOREIGN CONTROL OF THE SAME
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS ON 2016-12-13
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-12-05;
